channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee -- Network Security Management (NSM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee -- Network Security Management (NSM)

item.title: CVE-2018-6681|2024-08-05T06:10:11.272Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Abuse of Functionality vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) 9.1.7.11 and earlier allows authenticated users to allow arbitrary HTML code to be reflected in the response web page via appliance web interface.
